mapper.sql: select c.chatting_number, c.chatting_partner, c.member_email c_email, l.chatting_number, l.member_email l_email, l.chatting_content, l.chatting_time, m.member_email m_email, m.member_password, m.member_name, m.member_birthday, m.member_gender, m.member_tel, m.member_location, m.member_introduction, m.member_identification, m.member_picture from CHATTING c, CHATTINGLOG l, MEMBER m
mapper.select:
where c.chatting_number = l.chatting_number (+) and l.member_email = m.member_email and (c.member_email = #{memberEmail} or c.chatting_partner = #{memberEmail})
order by l.chatting_time
